descriptionHtml:
The Forbidden Island DEMO (Showcase)
[youtube]WCLvNN93_Zk[/youtube]




How do I get there?
Go to Orphan's Tear and there you will find a new ship, activate the wheel.

Intro
Start a new adventure, travel to the Sea of Pearls, uncover a new tropical Island called the Forbidden Island.

Description
The Forbidden Island is a massive project. It's a new DLC for the Elder Scrolls V Skyrim. You can have new girlfriends, join many new guilds, participate in new quests, gain reputation points to speak to people in a higher postition. Experience a beautiful tropical Island, live in paradise and participate and shape the story of the Forbidden Island, your decisions will play a major role in the story.

Features
Large Tropical Island
New Quests
New guilds
New girlfriends
New Soundtrack
New books & journals
and much more

Guilds
Red Sabre Pirates - Ruthless Pirates! The factino is controlled by Captain Jack, he spends most of his time in the Quck Crows Pub in Santa Mara. Their cunning and brutal. They mostly participate in raids and mostly care about the rum and the coin.
Yokudans "Ragada" "The Natives"
The Legion "Guards" "The Kings Circle" "Guards of Santa Mara "Guards of Santa Laura" "Guards of Atlantica" "Guards of Santa Monica"
Namira's Cult - Cannibals - 

Main Districts 
Oakheart - Poorest district, the people there gather scraps from the shipwrecks and cut down trees to make their houses, they envy Santa Mara & the noble districts.

Santa Mara - The Imperials built Santa Mara, they killed many natives, Yokudans and drove them back to the North. Santa Mara is in the center of the Forbidden Island.

Yakuda - Where the Natives live. After they fled Yokuda they made Yakuda their home, Yakuda is very beautiful and it has black sand beach. Yakuda is very dangerous it's crawling with wild animals in which the Yokudans tamed, but if you're an outsider the animals will attack you. Yakuda is the first location that was inhabited by mortals.

Athena - The richest place in The Forbidden Island. The Imperials built Athena they also made the arena and brought their gods & customs from the Imperial City only the middle class and rich nobles live in Athena. The city is protected by huge walls.

Poor Districts

The Slums, North West of The Forbidden Island, the Island is under Yakuda.

Oakheart South West of the Forbidden Island.

(Much more, will be released in the final build)

Disclaimer 
This mod is free from copy righted content, DJ Red Rad has received exclusive permission to use many assetts and the rest are free modding resources.

(Notice there are plenty of more voice actors not mentioned in the list, they will make an appearance in the final build.)

I would appreciate any type of support. Working really hard on this new unofficial DLC for the Elder Scrolls V Skyrim. The final build is coming this July or August. If you want to offer some voice acting, feel free to contact me on Steam.
